attributes.action: Enforce Leeds United AFC to re-think their latest badge design
attributes.additional_details:
The new design does not:- 
Display the Yorkshire Rose
Include any nod to football
Give any reference to the famous 'Smiley'
Show the famous LUFC
Pay homage to our past (ie 1919)

The new design does:-
Feature a headless man
Resemble American/MLS badges more than their English contemparies
Have undertones of thug culture rather than the progressive image our club battles to portray.

These are my views which I believe are shared by many
attributes.background: Today (24/1/18) Leeds United AFC unveiled their new badge after 'consulting' 10,000 fans. We hope to receive more support against the horrendous new design.
